comments: Jeff is an amazing professor, easily the best Spanish teacher I\'ve ever had. He definitely helps you understand the language, both in speaking and writing. His tips truly are helpful too, and I was always excited for his class everyday. Hilarious, sincere, interactive and a good dude.

tag_professor: Hilarious (7)  Participation matters (6)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Caring (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Super nice guy. Interesting class very engaging. However everyone seems to think this class is a breeze and let me tell you those people already have Spanish experience. If you have never taken any Spanish before be prepared to do work. Tests are long and brutal half written half MC. Homework is time consuming but doable

comments: the class is an easy A if you study for the quizzes, do the homework, and show up to class. He marks off 2% of your overall grade for every absence, but the class is honestly very easy. The second part of the class he makes everyone speak only Spanish or he will take points away from you.

stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  HILARIOUS  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: His classes are a lot of fun. They are structured in an informal, social manner. Your comprehension and speaking abilities will improve drastically just by being there and participating. He offers clear, often hilarious, explanations of the grammar or any other question you have. If you put in any effort at all and do the homework, you\'re set.

comments: He\'s a fantastic teacher! He makes class time very enjoyable, and teaches very well. I never practiced the language in any other Spanish class as much as this one. Do the online homework, focus in class, and study for the exams. My favorite class and teacher at OCC.

comments: Funny teacher, helpful, and keeps class entertaining. His class made me felt welcomed, chill and relaxed not like Math or Chemistry Class. He makes you meet your neighbors and participate in communicating with them in Spanish. Online homework is hard but it will help your grade. I would recommend taking this class. Just sit back and learn.

comments: Awesome, took 3 semesters of Spanish with this guy and I have to say I learned alot and 4 years later It stills ticks with me. He\'s practical, level headed, not emotionally based, funny, intelligent, and does his best to be a good teacher.

comments: This teacher is a masochist. I have a learning disability. He would curve a 89.27 but not an 88.80 percent, got the highest score in assignments, perfect attendance, and participation. I missed one question on his online work, finally got Spanish (none of the ways he suggested)while studying hard for the final and did great.

comments: Favorite teacher of all time! He is literally so funny, you will spend most of the class laughing at the absurd examples he uses to explain Spanish. Easiest A of my life I never got less than 100 on anything in that class. Wound up with 106 pretty effortlessly. Pay attention+ study a bit = easy A. Definitely recommend this class!!!

comments: The best Spanish teacher ever! Jeff is cool and funny. Take his classes if you are looking to speak Spanish.If you haven\'t taken HS Spanish before,you probably won\'t do well in his class. comments: Very easy class! If you know a little bit of Spanish, you will get through this class pretty easily. He speaks Spanish about 99% of the time. He does have a humor, so prepare to be picked on a little bit. Exams are pretty decent, but he does provide study guides. Very laid back class. A lot of partner activities as well.

tag_professor: Hilarious (7)  Participation matters (6)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Caring (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Very funny professor and surely enjoys teaching. During class time you have to speak in Spanish and you only have 3 exams in the entire semester. Attendance IS 20% of your grade, so attendance is extremely important. I would definitely recommend his class!

tag_professor: Hilarious (7)  Participation matters (6)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Caring (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: I am a spanish speaker, so it\'s unfair to say that this is a really easy class. Three exams which are mostly multiple choice and some writing, 20% of your grade is attendance, three online homework assignments, a few book assignments. He speaks spanish the whole class and expects you to do the same. He\'s pretty funny, I recommend his class.
